column4: hi guys, I've installed ubuntu netbook edition 10.10 on a netbook - I need help with boot parameters:
I need to add processor.max_cstate=1 usbcore.autosuspend=1 to the grub boot entry for ubuntu - where do I add this now?
the grub boot options don't appear there - seems to be something more complicated it /etc/grub.d/*
The GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX_DEFAULT is where you need to add extra kernel params.
